pullrequest.title: Support for loading an example UAV

content.raw:
The error disappeared. Thanks!

~~But the Iris still does not receive a command while the joy stick gives signals. Apparently, the node~~ `roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node` ~~generates a command when it receives odometry data, but there seems no node giving odometry.~~ ~~Maybe, do we need to include~~ `rotors_gazebo_plugin` ~~in the tgz file?~~

~~Ah, sorry! The file has~~ `librotors_gazebo_odometry_plugin.so` .~~ Maybe, something else is missing in my machine.~~

Sorry, never mind! The joy stick control works now. I think I just needed to re-build the entire part.
content.html:
The error disappeared. Thanks!

But the Iris still does not receive a command while the joy stick gives signals. Apparently, the node roll_pitch_yawrate_thrust_controller_node generates a command when it receives odometry data, but there seems no node giving odometry. Maybe, do we need to include rotors_gazebo_plugin in the tgz file?

Ah, sorry! The file has librotors_gazebo_odometry_plugin.so . Maybe, something else is missing in my machine.

Sorry, never mind! The joy stick control works now. I think I just needed to re-build the entire part.
